content: The Act titled "Seniors Financial Fraud Prevention Act of 2010" establishes an Office for the Prevention of Fraud Targeting Seniors. The Seniors Financial Fraud Prevention Act of 2010 establishes a separate office within the Federal Trade Commission to prevent fraud targeting seniors. The office will oversee fraud in various mediums and educate seniors, families, and caregivers on fraud prevention. The Seniors Financial Fraud Prevention Act of 2010 establishes an office within the Federal Trade Commission to prevent fraud targeting seniors.
